verbose_text: The Saccharomyces Cod1 mutant is deficient in the regulation of hydroxymethylglutaryl-coenzyme A degradation, an integral ER protein, and disruption of this P 5A -ATPase (also known as Spf1p) yields a glycosylation defective phenotype, perturbs cellular calcium homeostasis, and increases expression of Kar2p, an ER stress chaperone, and calcineurin activated genes, indicating secretory calcium store depletion [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
